Package com.extentech.ExtenBean

The ExtenBean package contains an Object Relational Data Object implementation used by ExtenXLS CellBinder data mapping and various data operations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DataObject Interface defining a Data Object encapsulating data.
DataObjectActionListener Listens for DataObject Actions
PageableDataObject An interface which extends the DataObject interface allowing for paging through result set data.
PagedList A paged list.
PersistenceEngine The PersistenceEngine interface defines persistence services for DatObjects
RelationalObject An Interface defining relational Data Objects encapsulating Relational data information.
SimpleDataObject Interface defining a Data Object encapsulating data.
SQLObject An Interface defining SQL Data Objects encapsulating JDBC data information.
 

Class Summary
colinfo Colinfo class stores metadata information for columns selected by the DataObject's query.
DataObjectImpl A concrete implementation of DataObject and RelationalObject

DataObjectQueryParser This class is responsible for bi-directional query building for data objects SQL is built by default, but should also support XQuery/XPath etc.
ExtenBeanFactory A DataObjectFactory which populates the data in classes which implement the DataObject interface.
ExtenDataObject The ExtenDataObject provides the functionality of a persistent entity bean.
GenericDataObject A basic DataObject implementation.
JSONDataObject A DataObject implementation which uses JSON (Java Script Object Notation) data.
PagedDataFactory An implementation of ExtenBeanFactory which allows for paging of data.
RelationalObjectImpl Concrete Relational Object implementation
Transaction Provides a simple transaction mechanism for DataObjects.
Utils  
VariableConverter a tool to replace public variables in classes with get/set methods
XMLDataObject A DataObject implementation which uses XML data.
XMLDataObjectFactory XMLDataObjectFactory is a PersistenceEngine used to initialize XMLDataObjects from XML Data Source.
XMLDOTester A class for testing XML DataObject functionality.
 

Package com.extentech.ExtenBean Description

The ExtenBean package contains an Object Relational Data Object implementation used by ExtenXLS CellBinder data mapping and various data operations. DataObjects can be instantiated and persisted to a variety of data sources including JDBC, XML, and CSV files. See: ExtenXLS Docs
